disclaimer_CalendarView1: Price data per room may differ from what appears on the OTA app. We collect data from the API provided by OTA with an update range of once every 2 hours. Each OTA has a different policy for displaying data in the application and sending data via the API
disclaimer_CalendarView2: The price difference between the application and the OTA varies in the range of Rp. 100; and IDR 300,000;
disclaimer_CalendarView3: The Crawler button is to update price data from OTA instantly. If the statement "OTA not found" appears, it is possible that the data room on that day has been sold out which causes the price data to not be updated.
disclaimer_CalendarView4: The Crawling process runs in the background and a notification will appear when the entire process is complete, even if you refresh or move pages.
disclaimer_Competitior1: The statistics are generated based on review and rating data collected from at least 1 of the 7 Online Travel Agencies (OTAs) in Indonesia, which include Traveloka, Booking, Pegi Pegi, Tiket, Google Review, Agoda, and TripAdvisor.
disclaimer_Dashboard1: The statistics are generated based on review and rating data collected from at least 1 of the 7 Online Travel Agencies (OTAs) in Indonesia, which include Traveloka, Booking, Pegi Pegi, Tiket, Google Review, Agoda, and TripAdvisor.
disclaimer_Dashboard2: Currently, sentiment analysis only works on Indonesian language reviews. English language reviews will be available in the upcoming version.
disclaimer_LineView1: Room name may differ, as it is adjusted to the data source from the OTA.
disclaimer_review1: Currently, sentiment analysis only works on Indonesian language reviews. The English review will be coming soon in a future version.
disclaimer_review2: Response and No Response filters are under development
disclaimer_review3: The sentiment filter works when you select a category
info_Competitor1: Please select your unit and at least 1 competitor unit that you want to compare
info_Negative_Impact: Negative impact is calculated based on the rating value as well as the number of negative sentiments from customers
info_Overall_Score: Shows review comparisons and responses over time
info_Performance: Performance score is obtained from the number of reviews in each OTA
info_Positive_Impact: Positive impact is calculated based on the rating value and the number of positive sentiments from customers
info_Response_Rate: The response rate value calculates how many reviews from customers are replied to by the hotel manager.
info_Reviews: Number of reviews for each OTA
name: Name
